title: Georgia-based Communications Provider Selects Broadview’s OfficeSuite® Phone for its Customer’s Cloud-based Communications Services
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 3:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Broadview Networks 
RYE BROOK, N.Y. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Broadview Networks, a leading provider of cloud-based business communications and information technology services, was selected by NovaCom Business Communications to be its preferred cloud-based provider for its customers nationwide. 
NovaCom is a voice, data and cloud communications consulting company based in Atlanta, Ga. which was looking to add a quality hosted voice partner and product offering to its portfolio for its premises-based customers considering a move to a cloud-based system. 
After careful consideration, NovaCom chose to offer OfficeSuite ® , Broadview’s cloud-based, unified communications solution, to its customers. OfficeSuite ® Phone includes all of the advanced features that NovaCom’s customers need and offers a no out-of-pocket option for equipment to its customers. “The fact that the features that our customers need, like unlimited auto attendants are already built into the platform as part of the service and there are no out-of-pocket costs for new phones is huge. It allows us to be extremely competitive for our customers,” stated Jeff Hardman, President of NovaCom Business Communications. 
“We’ve had great success with Broadview’s quality products and unique ability to get deals closed quickly,” Hardman continued. “The implementation experience and support has been far superior with Broadview and our customers who have been on OfficeSuite Phone ® have been very pleased.” 
“NovaCom Business Communications has been an outstanding partner for Broadview. We are proud to have such a strong presence in the agent channel and NovaCom is a great example of how our unique product offerings and award-winning service makes us the ideal partner for agents and their customers nationwide,” stated Donna Wenk, Broadview’s Senior Vice President of Alternative Channels. 
About NovaCom Business Communications 
NovaCom Business Communications is a voice, data and cloud communications consulting company in Georgia that excels in delivering their customers the latest cloud strategies and technologies in the industry. NovaCom Business Communications has been in business for more than ten years and sells hosted voice and cloud-based unified communications solutions to its customers nationwide. 
To learn more about OfficeSuite ® , click here . 
About Broadview Networks ® www.broadviewnet.com 
Broadview Networks is a network-based business communications provider serving customers with local and long-distance voice and data communications, premises-based and patented hosted VoIP systems, data services and a full suite of managed and professional services. It also provides an innovative portfolio of bundled, hosted IP phone and cloud computing services designed to meet the unique application requirements of diverse workforce groups. Its customers benefit from award-winning customer service, including a Web-based account management tool and a primary point-of-contact for real-time, personal customer care.
